channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nick Reiner, son of Rob Reiner and wife Michele, arrested
item.description: Nick Reiner, a son of director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele, has been arrested, according to online jail records from the Los Angeles Sheriff's Dep...

item.title: Australia mourns deadly Bondi Beach attack at Hanukkah celebration
item.description: Australia is mourning the 15 people who were killed in a mass shooting at a Hanukkah celebration at Sydney's Bondi Beach. CBS News foreign corresponde...

item.title: Brown University shooting victims identified
item.description: The two people who were killed in a shooting at Brown University​ on Saturday have been identified as students Ella Cook and Mukhammad Aziz Umurzokov.

item.title: Hollywood stars, politicians react to deaths of Rob Reiner and his wife
item.description: Tributes and condolences have poured in for the prolific director, actor and activist Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele, who were found dead Sunday in ...

item.title: Anxiety level 'has risen' amid manhunt in Brown mass shooting, mayor says
item.description: A person of interest was detained and released on Sunday, officials said.

item.title: Director Rob Reiner and wife Michele stabbed to death in home, son in custody
item.description: The Los Angeles Police Department is investigating a murder at a home that property records show belongs to director Rob Reiner.

item.description: As an actor and a film director, Rob Reiner was among the most admired figures in Hollywood, both for his personal warmth and for his brilliant career...

item.title: iRobot files for bankruptcy protection; will be private under restructuring
item.description: Roomba maker iRobot has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, but says that it doesn’t expect any disruptions to devices as the more than 30-yea...

item.title: Authorities say they will release person of interest detained in Brown University shooting
item.description: Officials in Providence say they will release a person of interest detained in a Brown University shooting that killed two students and injured nine.

item.title: A Brown University student survived being shot in high school. Then came the active shooter alerts
Photos show police investigation of a shooting at Brown University
